name: Radisson Blu Resort, Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text: Great hospitality , great staff, excellent hygiene,luxury rooms,nice pool,Also the view was awesome ,actually we usually like to change places but at sharm we would be always be a guests at radisson blu hotel. Everything was great,Thx Radisson team wish we come back soon.;)
reviews.title: Everything was great

reviews.text: I've been following reviews of this hotel for months before I actually arrived there, so I'll try to cover everything in this review to help people know what to expect of this brilliant resort.
reviews.title: Radisson Blu Resort.. A dream coming true!

reviews.text: 1. Location:
reviews.title: Radisson Blu Nabq Bay, The Place to be in Sharm el Shekh

reviews.text: This lovely resort is located at Nabq Bay, or as locals name it, "Al Gharqana". It is right after Nubian Village. It is about 15-20 minutes ride from the airport. Right in front of the resort, you can find a bazaar, supermarkets, pharmacy, diving gear, Bedouin hand crafts, etc.
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.text: 2. The Reception:
reviews.title: Outstanding Service/Great Resort/Excellent Price

reviews.text: It was really a great resort with lovely and friendly stuff, we didn't need to go anywhere out of the resort, it provides guests all their needs "food, enjoying, relaxing,.........etc.). It has a great location , transportation is very easy from it to anyplace in sharm elsheikh and it's beach has a great view on corals . Rooms were more than comfortable and very clean.
reviews.title: awesome resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: And really the best part of the resort was the wonderful animation team, they were very entertaining and friendly people with a very enjoyable activities.
reviews.title: Enjoyable Stay

reviews.text: My wife and I have just returned from 14 nights at the Radisson Blu Sharm.
reviews.title: Food!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was difficult to fault the hotel.
reviews.title: Food awful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a lovely sea view room with a large balcony in block 5.
reviews.title: Really lovely

reviews.text: Pre-arrival: I wrote an email with questions to the hotel before arriving, no answer for days. Sent two reminders and got a reply after two weeks. Wrote back with follow-up questions. This time did get a reply but no answers to the questions. A few more times and finally got it sorted.
reviews.title: OK, barely

reviews.text: Check-in: I had informed the hotel that when we would arrive (very early morning) yet when we came there was no-one in the reception. Managed to find someone after walking around shouting a while :-)
reviews.title: Potential to be excellent ....

reviews.text: Club Carlson benefits: I'm a gold member and was apparently upgraded from standard to superior room, don't know what the difference is. Apart from this there was no gold recognition.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel but food is very poor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room: Uninspired room with worn sheets.
reviews.title: very good hotel but...
Food is very poor
reviews.text: Service: All staff were friendly and helpful. English-skills sometimes lacking but they tried to communicate well. With a few tips the barmen sometimes came asking if you wanted a drink, while you were in your sunchair.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here for one week and we both really enjoyed it. This was our first time to Egypt, so were pretty open minded about the stay.
reviews.title: Great hotel and location - Very relaxing

reviews.text: We had a good flight then hit the check in Egypt which was a disaster, it took 2 hours to get through customs and we finally arrived at our hotel about 10.30pm at night.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had missed dinner, however the hotel had put some ham and cheese rolls, with salad and crisps in our room which we thought was nice.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First impressions of the hotel are very good, it's a big resort, they keep the whole site and pool incredibly clean and tidy, they staff are mainly all very friendly (the odd one seemed a bit grumpy) but generally very good.
reviews.title: Not 5 star hotel

reviews.text: Our room had a sea view, was clean, large with a bath and separate shower, the cleaners always go to town with the towels and rose petals on the bed most nights which the woman liked, air con worked well and there was a safe in room too.
reviews.title: More then wonderful

reviews.text: This is my 4th trip to the Radisson Blu in Sharm, this was the best so far, this year I enjoyed my trip with my brother and sister in law (who was celebrating her birthday).
reviews.title: Another Great stay
Excellent Hotel....BOOK NOW!
reviews.text: As usual the weather was fantastic as were the staff, from Check in, to all the restaurant especially Mohamhed to Abdel the room attendant to the guys in the bars and Hassan & Mohamhed in the recreation team.

The only down side was listening to people complaining about the temp of the water in the outdoor pools, to heat a pool that size would cost a fortune, they should keep there comments to themselves no everyone wants to know how they are feeling. Other than that a really great time.
reviews.title: Top Animation Team!

reviews.text: See you next year.
reviews.title: Fab!unfortunately exotic treat team no longer?!?!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Amazing hotel, rooms were lovely....we had two rooms next door to each other with a view of the beach! The beach was fantastic...MAHMOUD took care of us every day...he deserves a promotion!
reviews.title: A lovely holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from a week at this hotel and really struggle to find the reasons why so many people have made negative comments recently, we stayed in a Marine Club room (7169) the room was huge as was the bathroom, the only thing I would say is the bathroom was a bit on the tired side although it was spotlessly clean thanks to Mohamed our cleaner, who when it found out it was my birthday decorate the room with petals and toilet rool streamers and left a lovely chocolate cake, so thoughtfull! The grounds are amazing and beautifully landscaped, all the staff we encountered were friendly and helpful but a special mention should go to the following:Mohamed & Tarek in the resturant who always found us a table and served us with a smile and always found time for a chat however busy. Mahmoud down at the beach/small pool who always had our towels ready on the sunbeds and even faced our sunbeds just how we liked them! Lastly a mention to Maher Mansey the Manager again always greeted us with a smile and took the time for a chat and was happy to listen to any crtiisims we had, not that we really found any except as I say the bathroom, would definately return to this hotel
reviews.title: Excellent Service all round!

reviews.text: We booked a last minute deal for a week here at the radisson. We got a really nice room, clean very spacious with air con too. The shower was great and always hot. Our cleaner zidane was very polite and was always creating masterpieces with our bed linen and towels. He was friendly and did a fab job. Couldnt ask for any more.
reviews.title: Great value for money with very nice staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was very busy and mainly housing Russians so eating time was always very crazy and On 2 occasions a lot of the food had already finished before we could have eaten and the queues were crazy long to line up and grab as much as you can. I like to relax not run around trying to find a table.
reviews.title: Everything about this hotel is outstanding

reviews.text: I paid 500 EP for a body scrub and massage as it wasn't that good and only rec 45 mins massage when I paid for 60mins I didn't argue this fact as I'm on holiday and didn't want to cause any problems. But it was a total waste of money.
reviews.title: Relaxing Break but shame about the restaurant

reviews.text: The beach/ pool guy Mahmoud was extremely nice and he reserved our sun beds everyday so we didn't have to rush to save them he was lovely to talk to as most of the other staff seemed to always want something from you and annoy you all the time, Mahmoud was the opposite and was nice to chat with, he borrowed up some snorkeling masks free so we could check out the coral. He was by far the nicest staff member I've ever met at a hotel and I have extensively travelled.
reviews.title: Staff treatment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pros:
reviews.title: Better than our previous Stay!

reviews.text: - since last year the quality of the food and services is better and a lot more attention to details is granted for the grounds (garden, bridges and water course is perfectly and constantly maintained);
reviews.title: Eveything was great

reviews.text: - good spa services (massage and facial treatment for ladies);
reviews.title: Mahmoud is a legend!

reviews.text: - good feedback from the staff with respect to:
reviews.title: Nice quiet hotel but with some Egyptian "buts"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: --- internet connection and pc service: Mr. Abu Bakr is the man which helped us a lot to fix our crashed laptop! Many many thanks!
reviews.title: Missing something...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had an amazing stay at Radisson Blu, it was our honey moon we stayed from 20/9/2013 till 27/9/2013. Food was really nice and we had a lot of varieties specially the pasta buffet with Chief Ahmed. Our room was located on the pool with a full see view and pool view, the interior design was awesome!!! I advice any body with this location it was room No. 5254.
reviews.title: Amazing Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Entertainment was managed by new high standard company called Exotic Treat Entertainment which was very well managed and organized. They were so Lovely and kind with all guests from all nationalities, they made every body happy !! I also can see that they were very well trained and know how to solve problems by a nice and elegant way. Also i would like to advice every one who like clubbing and discos to go with them, they were really honest about it and we really appreciated how much they cared about the safety and the satisfaction of everyone.
reviews.title: So close to being really great.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The evening shows was fantastic for all nationalities and they really knew how to involve every one in their shows and activities without bothering no one. we also cannot forget to say something about the music on the pool and the beach which was very well selected, Special thanks for all of them " DJ Bob, Buddha, Anastasia, and Hany.... " i don't want to forget any one.... we will definitely be back for them)
reviews.title: This hotel is not 5 star

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The guys in reception were really helpful and nice with us, Also i cannot forget to speak about the bars and restaurants service which was really very well done even in the rush time. We had lots of fun in our last night, The entertainment team organized a fabulous pool party and they got us all in the pool.
reviews.title: Vegetarians B & B recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Special thanks for all the staff and the management, we will definitely be back again.
reviews.title: Hotel needs re-evaluating

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 7 days in Room 7137 - Marine Room (ground floor compounds towards the sea)
reviews.title: Outdated

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: PROS:
reviews.title: Disaster!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - roomy bedroom and bathroom (Marine Room - Upgraded);
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel and great staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - best animation team at the beach in last 4 years in Egypt (volley, stretching, dance lessons, dart, etc.);
reviews.title: Prefect festive getaway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - clean premisses: common areas and rooms although the water flow within the complex was shut off due to endless maintenance works (to sad);
reviews.title: Excellent stay! Will come back! - Super stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at this hotel in November , it was an anniversary present from our daughter and son-in-law , Although the the hotel and grounds are beautiful some of the other aspects are not so good. Firstly we didn't want to upgrade to the all inclusive as we prefer to dine out in different restaurants whilst on holiday and we read that there were 5 restaurants on the complex , A french al-a-carte, non existent,( Lebanese one that was always empty, on the plan where French one should have been ) Trade Winds, sea food restaurant, again always empty.Ill Grotto pizza and pasta ,and next door to that the Italian restaurant, and finally Olivos the buffet breakfast ,lunch and dinner restaurant. We were glad that we only had to eat our breakfast in there as flies everywhere, staff very inattentive and generally apathetic to diners.
reviews.title: Definately not FIVE STAR

reviews.text: As we were only on a bed and breakfast tariff trying to get a drink was obviously too much for most of the staff to fathom out, they constantly had to confer with each other make a telephone call and 20 minutes later you got your drink. If we had have paid the other £90 each we would have got miniscule beakers of drinks and 25% off
reviews.title: Optimum service agaist money

reviews.text: the bill in those other restaurants definately not worth it.
reviews.title: Truly Customer focussed resort

reviews.text: On a positive note the waiters in the Italian restaurant were excellent ,they were very well mannered , attentive ,nothing was too much trouble, the food was excellent we ate there three times that week, the other staff in this hotel could learn alot from these young men its a pity that there were never many people dining there.
reviews.title: very good hotel

reviews.text: Finally I would like to warn people to padlock their cases when being collected and taken to the reception on their departure , it wasn't until I arrived home and found an item had been taken from one of the cases, now I know why I saw so many cases wrapped in cling film, the foreigners obviously knew something we didn't.
reviews.title: terrible service terrible hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What can I say. This hotel and its staff are great. We stayed here in 2010 and booked a hotel in centre of sharm for a change this year. What a mistake so after 7 days out of our 10 day stay, I made a call to the radisson to stay for the rest of my holiday. On arrival Mohammad on reception recognised me from my previous visit and immediately upgrade our room. 7136 a deluxe bungalow on the beach, amazing. From the moment we arrived we were treated like royalty. Prime spot saved each day at beach, Ezzet at the restaurant made our meals special by fulfilling my request one morning for strawberries, and arranging a special lunch on the day we left. This is a luxurious hotel and the staff too many to mention make every day wonderful. We are planning a trip with all our family next year.
reviews.title: Fabulous

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from an eleven night stay at the Radisson Blu Sharm-el-Sheikh. The hotel is clean, the food good and the staff are just excellent - they really made our stay special. Particularly worth a mention are Sherif, Hamada and Tarek in the restaurant and Mahmoud at the beach - thanks to you all.
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.text: My wife was recuperating from a broken ankle and the hotel gave us a ground floor room and provided her with a wheelchair. We could access everywhere by wheelchair, including the pools and beach. The all inclusive food was really good, and we did eat in the non-inclusive restaurants twice. You get a 25% discount off the food in the non-inclusicve restaurants (making a Pizza for two around £4) and you can still enjoy the all-inclusive drinks there.
reviews.title: Going again next year!

reviews.text: The rooms are very large and well equipped. The cleaners kept our room spotless.
reviews.title: A welcome return

reviews.text: The only negative was that the outdoor pools are not heated and were too cold for me. However, the sea was very warm and you can snorkel on the coral reef that forms the hotel's beach.
reviews.title: One of the better Hotels in Sharm

reviews.text: Hey guys! I've been a lot in Egypt before and this was my first trip with my 2 kids alone (8 months old baby girl and 3 y.o. boy) we stayed 7-21 Dec, 2 weeks. My main concern when choosing the hotel was that its safe for the kids and there's a lot of green area and shadow. And for other worried parents I'm recommending this place warmly!
reviews.title: Great place for a holiday with kids!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms: we stayed first week in standard double room, ground floor and it was huge! Wardrobe, terrace, pool and garden view- really nice! My son slept on a huge bed and I combined 2 soft armchairs for the baby- it was a perfect soft sleep-and-play place. My mistake- I kept our terrace door for too long first night and let in lots of mosquitos, but there was no problem the rest of a holiday. For parents who travel with crawling ones- don't forget the long warm trousers, cause the floor is quite cold for the babies. The only thing probably about the room- housekeeper won't wash the floor daily, but other wise everything was on level!
reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered

reviews.text: Second week we got ourselves a sea-front room and it was perfect! There was both a shower cabin and bath- kids loved it. I could make myself a coffee, put on a white bathrobe and sleepers and seat outside on terrace, watch the sun rising. We usually woke up at 5:30, watched the sun rising at 6:30 and then walked for a breakfast. Around 8 we reserved ourselves best places by the sea, with sand entrance. Sometimes we stayed on our terrace, taking sun and playing. Going back to room for some rest was always a pleasure! This room was cleaned a lot better, they washed a floor every day.
reviews.title: Great Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food: since we've got all inclusive, my only effort was putting it on plate :) I heard other parents complaining about "no kids table", but I had no problems with that! There was always lots of different food: meat, chicken, grill, fish, rice and potatoes and lots of salads- definitely something to choose from for my 3 y.o. boy, and as for the baby- I had 1 week reserve brought along with me and then I found everything we needed in 24/7 supermarket which is 20 min walk from the hotel. Service is really good, those guys did amazing job! Hostess lady on the entrance- Marwa, she was so helpful, holding and entertaining my baby and letting me enjoying the meal :) My special thanks to her! And Osama- the waiter in Trade Winds. He went extra mile by saving my son from splinter. He gave him a candy and got rid of splinter in his foot so easily that boy didnt even cry! He acted more confident and professional than the doctor from clinic :)
reviews.title: Exciting

reviews.text: Also, the good thing about ALL is that you can have some food in between breakfast lunch or dinner- they serve some fast food by the pool and in Trade Winds restaurant by the sea. It helped a lot when my boy slept lunch hours and needed some food later on. When I needed some break of fast food for son, I asked for some take away. Usually it's not allowed, but when you're with babies- those guys are very understanding!
reviews.title: Awful holiday

aka: Radisson Blu Resort, Sharm El Sheikh Hotel Sharm El Sheikh
